title: A Proper Thank You
description:
Domonique Foxworth is joined by sports writer's Charles McDonald and Spencer Hall to debate what to make of Baker Mayfield’s thank you letter to Cleveland and what intrigues them most in this year’s NCAA Tournament.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
